articles.author: Daisy Dobrijevic
articles.title: Aurora alert! 4 coronal mass ejections are racing toward Earth and could spark impressive northern lights this week - Space
articles.description: Scientists say a train of CMEs could impact Earth's magnetic field Oct. 15–17, bringing a chance of northern lights across northern North America.
articles.content: A train of solar storms is barreling toward Earth, with four coronal mass ejections (CMEs) expected to hit over the next few days. Any potential impact could trigger impressive auroras in northern sk… [+3146 chars]
